text.section: In this section, "vehicle" includes a motor vehicle, streetcar, locomotive, engine, and train.
A person may not cause the death of another as a result of the person's driving, operating, or controlling a vehicle or vessel in a grossly negligent manner.
A violation of this section is manslaughter by vehicle or vessel.
A person who violates this section is guilty of a felony and on conviction is subject to imprisonment not exceeding 10 years or a fine not exceeding $5,000 or both.

section.section: An indictment or other charging document for manslaughter by vehicle or vessel is sufficient if it substantially states:
An indictment or other charging document for manslaughter by vehicle or vessel need not set forth the manner or means of death.
